Context:
The George Brown College provides wireless internet access in various areas of each campus including libraries. Students and staff can connect to the college WiFi network using their STU-View log in credentials. Assistance with wireless access is available from the Library Learning Commons Help Desk. Eduroam provides George Brown students and staff with free wireless access at participating educational institutions. For more information about WiFi access, Eduroam, and other college news and updates, students can sign up on the website or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca using the phone number 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-8717-515-5559). The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.

Entities: George Brown College, libraries, STU-View log in credentials, Library Learning Commons Help Desk, Eduroam, participating educational institutions (e.g., Ryerson University), Toronto Metropolitan University, students, staff, website, ask.george@geurebrown.ca, phone number 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559)

Dates: December 18, 2023
